abstract: My partner and I will be traveling to Thailand for two weeks in January. While we have traveled to Europe and South America several times, this will be our first trip to Asia. Can you recommend an itinerary that focuses on culture and cuisine, rather than on beer, beaches and debauchery (as seems to be the case with some seemingly "The Hangover Part II"-inspired guidebooks)? Thanks.Gary O'Connor, Silver Spring, Md.

headline.main: Q&A: A Trip to Thailand, Hangover Not Included
